message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $7500.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $6800?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $7200.
Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'd like to make another offer. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $6900?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $7100.
Hi Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'd like to make another offer. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $6500?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $7000.
Hi Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $6600?
